title: User Information
subtitle: View your current user information and set your daily progress goal.
loginMessage: Please log in to view your profile information and data. You can still alter your daily goal, but this will reset each day at midnight in addition to your progress data.

progressGoal.title: Progress
progressGoal.setGoalDescription: Your daily goal measures the amount of time you have spent watching our comprehensible input videos. This will reset each day.

outsideHours.title: Outside Hours
outsideHours.description1: Here you can add the amount of time you have spent listening to other English comprehensible input resources outside of EnglishSponge.
outsideHours.description2: You should not include other activities like reading, speaking or writing.
outsideHours.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a brief description of the activity...
outsideHours.descriptionLevelPlaceholder: Describe what you did to achieve this level...
outsideHours.totalToAdd: Total to add: {{hours}} hours and {{minutes}} minutes
outsideHours.cannotExceed: Cannot exceed 3,000 total hours. You can only add {{hours}} hours and {{minutes}} minutes more.
